pages.text: $(li)The Tripwire Hook is a placeable block that is capable of detect players, creatures, or even items.$(br)$(li)First you need to place two Tripwire Hook lined up.

$(li)Now just right click on them while you are holding String on your hand.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft a Trapped Chest in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)Fletcher will exchange your Tripwire Hooks by Emeralds.$(br2)Insert a picture of Tripwire Hook
